tool.name: UCSC Trix Index Generator
tool.description: Create UCSC Trix index from a tab-delimited text file or a Fasta file
tool.command: #if $input_type.input_type_selector == "fasta": python $__tool_directory__/extractHeaders.py $input_type.input_file tab_file && ixIxx tab_file ${index_ix} ${index_ixx} #else: ixIxx $input_type.input_file ${index_ix} ${index_ixx} #end if
tool.help:
UCSC Trix Index Generator ==========================
Generate UCSC Trix index from a Fasta file or a Tabular file -------------------------------------------------------------
ixIxx - Create indices for simple line-oriented file of format
Reference: https://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenpath/help/trix.html
Source code: ============
http://hgdownload.cse.ucsc.edu/admin/exe/
